changeSet.author: CloudSoft.User3
changeSet.sql:
ALTER TABLE project ADD numar_proiect TEXT NULL DEFAULT NULL, ADD domeniu_bancar_nom_val_id BIGINT NULL DEFAULT NULL, ADD proiect_initiat_arb BOOLEAN NULL DEFAULT NULL, ADD arie_de_cuprindere TEXT NULL DEFAULT NULL, ADD proiect_initiat_alta_entitate TEXT NULL DEFAULT NULL, ADD evaluarea_impactului TEXT NULL DEFAULT NULL, ADD incadrare_proiect_nom_val_id BIGINT NULL DEFAULT NULL, ADD autoritati_implicate TEXT NULL DEFAULT NULL, ADD obiective_proiect TEXT NULL DEFAULT NULL, ADD cadrul_legal TEXT NULL DEFAULT NULL, ADD specificitate_proiect TEXT NULL DEFAULT NULL, DROP COLUMN importance, ADD grad_importanta_nom_val_id BIGINT NULL DEFAULT NULL,
ADD CONSTRAINT project_dom_bancar_nomenclator_value_id_fk FOREIGN KEY (domeniu_bancar_nom_val_id) REFERENCES nomenclator_values(id), ADD CONSTRAINT project_incadrare_nomenclator_value_id_fk FOREIGN KEY (incadrare_proiect_nom_val_id) REFERENCES nomenclator_values(id), ADD CONSTRAINT project_importanta_nomenclator_value_id_fk FOREIGN KEY (grad_importanta_nom_val_id) REFERENCES nomenclator_values(id) ;
